data.oai_dc:dc: Fossil-calibrated penalized likelihood tree, 4 calibrations: trs.calib.jackknife.4.annotated

Tree calibrated using the discrete clock model, penalized likelihood, as implemented in the chronos function of ape (https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ape/index.html), 4 calibration points. File generated using Treeannotator (https://www.beast2.org/treeannotator/), uncertainty at nodes estimated by calibrating trees 500x, drawing dates from distributions as described in paper, on delete-half jackknife trees (as described in paper).
American oaks|convergence|niche evolution|phylogeny|restriction-site associated DNA sequencing (RAD-seq)|sympatric parallel diversification|woody plants
